Package index

All functions

abs_plot()
Generate a time-series plot for ABS labour force indicators.
aiti_cols() deprecated
List available colours
aiti_pal() deprecated
Generate AITI colours from a palette
as_comma()
Format a value as a pretty string, with comma separation
as_comma_group()
Format a group of values of different magnitudes with comma separation
as_percent()
Format a value as a pretty string, with a percentage sign printed
as_percentage_point()
Format a value as a pretty string, with the percentage points suffix
average_over()
The average of an indicator between two years
change()
Create a string describing whether an indicator has increased or decreased over the year, or over the previous month
clear_output()
Apply dominance check to ABS unit record data. This function is not exported
current()
Return the most recent (current) value for an indicator
fof_cols()
List available colours
fof_pal()
Generate Factory of the Future colours from a pre-defined palette
growth()
Growth of an ABS indicator.
last_value()
Find the value for an indicator for this month last year, or the previous month.
palette_names()
List available palettes
plot_employed_total() plot_employed_full_time() plot_employed_part_time() plot_unemployed_total() plot_unemployed_looked_for_full_time_work() plot_unemployed_looked_for_part_time_work() plot_labour_force_total() plot_underemployed_total() plot_underutilised_total() plot_hours_worked() plot_hours_worked_full_time() plot_hours_worked_part_time() plot_not_in_the_labour_force() plot_working_population() plot_employment_population_ratio() plot_unemployment_rate() plot_unemployment_rate_looked_for_full_time_work() plot_unemployment_rate_looked_for_part_time_work() plot_participation_rate() plot_underemployment_ratio() plot_underemployment_rate() plot_underutilisation_rate() plot_sahm_recession_indicator()
Convenience functions for creating charts for ABS and other
read_absdata()
Read ABS time series data.
release()
Print the most recent month/year of an ABS Time Series
render_monthly_briefing()
Render AITI Monthly Labour Force Briefing in .pdf format
sahm()
Plot the Sahm Recession Indicator for a given state. The Sahm indicator compares the 3 month average (seasonally adjusted) unemployment rate with the minimum over the last 12 months. Sahm values over 1 are indicative of a recession.
scale_colour_aiti() deprecated
AITI Colour Scale
scale_colour_fof()
Colour scale for Factory of the Future colours
scale_fill_aiti() deprecated
AITI Fill Scale
scale_fill_fof()
Fill scale for Factory of the Future colours
theme_aiti() deprecated
AITI Theme
theme_fof()
ggplot2 theme for Factory of the Future
theme_foundation()
Foundation Theme
value_at()
Value of an ABS Time Series indicator for a specific year and month.
visualise_palette()
Visualise individual palettes
